mapper.insert: insert into t_menu (ID, MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PATH, PARENT_MENU_NO, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_SEQ_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentMenuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_menu set MENU_NO = #{menuNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_PATH = #{menuPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_MENU_NO = #{parentMenuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MENU_SEQ_NO = #{menuSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PATH, PARENT_MENU_NO, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_SEQ_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from t_menu where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PATH, PARENT_MENU_NO, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_SEQ_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from t_menu where MENU_NO = #{menuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PATH, PARENT_MENU_NO, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_SEQ_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from t_menu
